snippet: Archbishop Timothy M. Dolan didn’t directly reference his recent promotion to cardinal during the service, but churchgoers didn’t hold back as they offered gifts and words of praise.
abstract: Well-wishers gather at St Patrick's Cathedral in New York City as Archbishop Timothy M Dolan offers Sunday Mass for first time since Pope Benedict XVI announced his elevation to cardinal
lead_paragraph: Archbishop Timothy M. Dolan didn’t directly reference his recent promotion to cardinal during the service, but churchgoers didn’t hold back as they offered gifts and words of praise.

headline.seo: Well-Wishers Praise Dolan at First Mass Since Elevation
headline.main: Gifts for Dolan at First Sunday Mass Since News of Elevation
headline.print_headline: Gifts for Dolan at First Sunday Mass Since News of Elevation
